Sayyid[lower-alpha 1] (UK: /ˈsaɪd, ˈseɪjɪd/, US: /ˈsɑːjɪd /; Arabic: Cid ; Persian: ; nke pụtara 'Mazi', 'Nnanyi’, ' Onyenwe anyi’, na Arabic'; ọtụtụ:ادة sādah; nwanyị: سيدة سyida: [sejːjɪɪd] bụ utu aha nsọpụrụ nke na egosi ndị anabatara dị ka ụmụ nke onye amụma Islam Muhammad site na ụmụ ya, Hasan ibn Ali Ali; Ali Ali Ali' ibn Ali' na ụmụ ya.
Ọ bụ ezie na n'oge mmalite nke Islam, a na-etinye aha Al-Sayyid na ndị niile sitere na banu hashim, agbụrụ nke onye amụma Islam Muhammad
Mana ka e mesịrị, e mere aha ahụ kpọmkwem maka soso ndị nke Hasani na Hussaini, karịsịa site na ndị Fatimid Caliphs.
